title: Finder, Vol. 1: Target in the Viewfinder
description: While on assignment trying to document the illegal activities of the Japanese underworld, photographer Takaba crosses paths with the dark and mysterious leader Asami. Asami takes Takaba captive, in an attempt to subjugate and possess him. But when the son of the Chinese mafia enters demanding evidence that Takaba may have, will Takaba be able to survive being caught in the crosshairs of a deadly underworld feud?---Taken from back cover:"Never forget the pain you received from me today...and the pleasure." Akihito, an adventure-seeking freelance photographer, falls into the clutches of the handsome and aloof Asami, a power player in the criminal underworld! In the single click of a shutter, Akihito is abducted, bound, and made to surrender both body and soul. It could take years for the memory of his violation to fade away...but does Akihito want to forgive and forget? Some trysts are only meant to last for one night...and some can change a man forever.FINDER returns with a vengeance! Fan-favorite Ayano Yamane's most-requested work takes off in a new edition with gorgeous new full-color art included in this publication! And the series that revolutionized the boy's love genre keeps heart rates racing with white-hot side stories of betrayal, bonding and plenty of steamy exploration. Sometimes it takes a little push to cross over into a forbidden realm of pleasure...but there's no guarantee you'll find your way back!
author: Ayano Yamane
